titles.title: VISIT Act of 2020
VISIT Act of 2020
Volunteers Improving Social Isolation and loneliness Together Act of 2020

A bill to establish within the Department of Veterans Affairs a pay-for-results pilot program to assist veterans, members of the Armed Forces on active duty, and their family members at risk of social isolation and loneliness, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
Volunteers Improving Social Isolation and loneliness Together Act of 2020 or the VISIT Act of 2020
This bill requires the Department of Veterans Affairs to implement a pilot program in two tiers to assess the feasibility and advisability of assisting veterans, members of the Armed Forces or National Guard, or family members of such individuals who are at risk of social isolation and loneliness through the funding of specified national service programs (VISIT pay for results projects).
